title: this system of reports is broken!
body: how can you have a report system that allows any one to say anything without any proof !  you allow players to cut and paste on word pad to make a report even a false report and you believe what ever the fuck they say!   are you serious! at least check the game chat log!  FFS! you make me sad riot ive played your game for 4-5 years love it and hate the community that you encourage!

replies.body: Stop spamming. Players do not get to send in their own chat logs for you. The system pulls them directly from the game, and your reform card shows your own chat only. If an incorrect log was sent to you, talk to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about it.
